column1: The Pit Room////I have only been here once
column2: so I look forward to giving them another chance. It was a Saturday and they were a bit busy
column3: but there were only 3 people ahead of us in line and it took about 15 minutes to get served. Had ribs
column5: and brisket. The sausage was very good. Ribs were good
column6: but not super tender. I made a mistake and didn't specifically ask for moist brisket. I got fairly tough
column7: dried out brisket. I did see some moist brisket on a few other plates
column8: so I will give it a try another time. Interior is super small and difficult to find seating when busy. I compare BBQ joints to my favorite
